data.name: Crowdability
data.headline: Software Engineer Contractor at [Crowdability](https://www.crowdability.com/)
data.description: Providing backend and DevOps support for Crowdability, an education platform for individual investors
achievements: Created a Lambda (AWS) function that invalidated old content on a Cloudfront.
Updated mission critical Lambda functions to version Python 3, and provided an automated pipeline to update and transition to the new functions.

data.name: Bulb Rocket
data.headline: Softwear Engineer Contractor
achievements: Managed a blog migration to Wordpress for Merlin News. Conducted the database migration and modified an existing theme to the clients specifications using PHP
Conducted MySQL queries to repair text errors as a result of migrating from one database to another. Added custom fields to the database as per clients' request
Imported existing blog articles for the Tycoon Report from a legacy CMS database into an existing Wordpress website

data.name: CG Generalist
data.headline: Various projects
data.description: Worked on a series of contract jobs as a CG generalist, ranging from short films to indie game projects
